Detailed Description

"iStuffMobile" proxy program to communicate with the "Event Heap".

The "iStuff Mobile" proxy Class which communicates with the "Event Heap". The two main functionalities of this class are:

  1. Receive events of type iStuffMobile from the "Event Heap" and send appropriate commands to the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application.
  2. Receive Key Press events from the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application and post corresponding key events on the "Event Heap".

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

iStuffMobileProxy.iStuffMobileProxy (  String  ip,
String  proxyID,
String  cmprt
) 
 

iStuffMobile class constructor

The constructor take "Event Heap" IP address, the current proxy Id and a COM port name as an inputs.

Parameters:
ip as a String. Specifies the IP address of the "Event Heap".
proxyID as a String. Specifies the proxy ID to be used while posting Events and to be checked while receiving events.
cmprt as a String. Specifies the COM Port name.

Member Function Documentation

void iStuffMobileProxy.Destroy (   ) 
 

Disconnects the proxy.

This method is called when Ctrl + C is hit on the keyboard. It sends a Disconnect command to the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application, closes I/O streams and exits the Proxy.

void iStuffMobileProxy.getPathAndRedirect (  Event  recEvent  )  [private]
 

Sends high-level commands to the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application.

This method extracts the "Command" and "Path" fields from the Event passed as parameter and issue a corresponding high-level command to the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application along with the path. This method is called from public boolean returnEvent(Event[] retEvents) inside this class for high-level commands that require a path field.

Parameters:
recEvent as an Event Object. Specifies an Event containing "Command" and "Path" fields.

void iStuffMobileProxy.initSerial (   )  throws Exception [private]
 

Initializes the serial ports.

This method initializes the input and output stream member variables. It throws an exception if the COM port identifier is not found.

void iStuffMobileProxy.read (  InputStream  in,
byte[]  buffer,
int  off,
int  len
)  throws IOException
 

Reads data from input stream.

This method reads data from the given input stream(in) into the provided buffer(buffer) starting from an offset index(off). Number of bytes to be read are specified by length(len).

Parameters:
[in] in as an InputStream object. Data is read from this input stream.
[out] buffer as a Byte array. The read data is copied to this buffer as bytes.
[in] off as an Integer. Specifies the offset index from which writing into the buffer should start.
[in] len as an Integer. Specifies the number of bytes to be read from the given input stream.

void iStuffMobileProxy.redirectEvent (  int  command  )  [private]
 

Sends high-level commands to the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application.

This method sends an int command to the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application. This method is called from public boolean returnEvent(Event[] retEvents) inside this class.

Parameters:
command as an Ingeter. Specifies the opcode to be sent to the mobile phone application.

boolean iStuffMobileProxy.returnEvent (  Event[]  retEvents  ) 
 

Callback Method from the "Event Heap".

This method is called whenever an event matching the template is found on the event heap. This function decodes the events of type "iStuffMobile" and issues corresponding high-level commands to the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application.

Parameters:
retEvents as an Event array. The first element of the array is the matching event. Subsequent events in the array are the template events used for the match.
Returns:
The function should return true if it wants to continue recieving callbacks, and false if it is done and doesn't want to recieve any more callbacks.

void iStuffMobileProxy.run (   ) 
 

Receives key codes from the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application.

This method runs all the time and listens to key codes from the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application and posts corresponding key events onto the "Event Heap".

void iStuffMobileProxy.sendChangeProfile (  Event  recEvent  )  [private]
 

Sends a profile change command to the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application.

This method extracts the "Command" and "ProfileNo" fields from the Event passed as parameter and issue a profile change command to the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application along with the profile number. This method is called from public boolean returnEvent(Event[] retEvents) inside this class for opcode OPCODE_CHANGEPROFILE.

Parameters:
recEvent as an Event Object. Specifies an Event containing "Command" and "ProfileNo" fields.

void iStuffMobileProxy.sendKey (  Event  recEvent  )  [private]
 

Sends a key press simulation command to the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application.

This method extracts the "Command", "Code", "ScanCode", and "Repead" fields from the Event passed as parameter and issue a Key Press simulation command to the "iStuff Mobile" mobile phone application. This method is called from public boolean returnEvent(Event[] retEvents) inside this class for opcode OPCODE_KEY_RECEIVED.

Parameters:
recEvent as an Event Object. Specifies an Event containing "Command" "Code", "ScanCode" and "Repeat" fields.
